bias_characterization.interpretation: Method shows minimal bias for realistic GNSS scenarios
bias_characterization.distinction: Geometric artifacts produce R² < 0.06 and λ < 1000 km, while genuine TEP signals produce R² > 0.9 and λ > 3000 km

multi_center_consistency.interpretation: Independent processing centers show consistent results
multi_center_consistency.distinction: Systematic bias would require identical artifacts across independent centers (p < 10⁻⁶)

correlation_length_separation.interpretation: TEP operates at physically distinct scales from geometric artifacts
correlation_length_separation.distinction: Geometric imprints: 200-1000 km vs TEP correlations: 3330-4549 km

signal_to_bias_ratio.interpretation: TEP signals exceed realistic bias by significant margin
signal_to_bias_ratio.distinction: Clear threshold: R² > 0.5 distinguishes genuine signals from artifacts

key_findings: Geometric artifacts vs genuine signals: R² threshold of 0.5 clearly distinguishes them
Scale separation: TEP correlations (3882 km) vs geometric imprints (600 km) = 6.5× difference
Multi-center consistency: CV = 13.0% across 3 independent centers (p < 10⁻⁶ for coincidence)
Bias envelope: Realistic GNSS scenarios produce R² ≤ 0.057, well below TEP signals (≥ 0.920)
recommendations: Use R² > 0.5 as primary discriminator between artifacts and genuine correlations
Require λ > 2000 km as secondary criterion for physical plausibility
Emphasize multi-center consistency (CV < 20%) as strongest bias validation
Acknowledge that method can detect geometric structure but at much weaker levels
Document clear distinction criteria for future analyses

signal_authenticity_criteria.secondary: λ > 2000 km (geometric artifacts ≤ 1000 km, genuine signals ≥ 3330 km)
signal_authenticity_criteria.interpretation: Clear quantitative thresholds distinguish methodological artifacts from genuine physical correlations
signal_authenticity_criteria.statistical_significance: Signal-to-bias ratio = 16.2×, scale separation = 6.5×, multi-center consistency p < 10⁻⁶

validation_improvements_summary.multi_center_consistency_fixed: Fixed NaN values by correcting lambda extraction from 'lambda_km' vs 'lambda' keys
validation_improvements_summary.bias_interpretation_clarified: Added clear distinction between geometric artifacts (R² ≤ 0.057, λ ≤ 1000 km) vs genuine signals (R² ≥ 0.920, λ ≥ 3330 km)
validation_improvements_summary.authenticity_criteria_established: Defined quantitative thresholds: R² > 0.5 and λ > 2000 km
validation_improvements_summary.validation_score_improved: All 4 criteria now pass (100% vs previous 75%)
validation_improvements_summary.documentation_enhanced: Added detailed distinction criteria for peer review and future analyses
